value.title: Power BI February 2023 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the February 2023 update! This month, we’ve added TypeScript support in the developer playground sandbox, several new formatting features for reporting, and so much more. Continue reading for more details on our new features!

value.title: Power BI Update - December 2022
value.excerpt: Welcome to the December 2022 update. This month, we’ve added a variety of new DAX functions, updated slicer type formatting, brought Metrics to the Windows app, and more! value.title: Power BI Update - November 2022
value.excerpt: Welcome to the November 2022 update. This month's update introduces a change to our Power BI accent color, and is further filled with exciting updates to features like small multiples, modeling, metrics, and more! value.title: Power BI September 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the September 2022 update. We are thrilled to announce a variety of new features such as hierarchical axis by default, translations for composite models, mobile formatting options general availability and cross tenants’ datasets sharing. There is more to explore, please continue to read on.

value.title: Power BI August 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the August 2022 update. Can you imagine it’s the last month of summer already? We are excited to announce a variety of new features such as the conditional formatting for data labels, new “Select sensitivity label” dialog, data loss prevention policy update and DAX editor improvements. value.title: Power BI Update - July 2022
value.excerpt: Welcome to the July 2022 update. value.title: Power BI June 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the June 2022 update. We are excited to announce the general availability of the new Format Pane, error bars and information protection updates, table navigation improvements, Connect to datamarts and Power BI Data Storytelling features. There is more to explore, please continue to read on.

value.title: Announcing: Action bar for interactive reports in the Power BI tab for Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce that the Power BI tab in Microsoft Teams is getting a new action bar for interactive reports. The action bar enables users in the Power BI tab to use all the capabilities they have in the service when interactive reports are added to channels, chats, or meetings in Microsoft

value.title: Power BI May 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the May 2022 update. value.title: Reminder: WebView2 will be required for the next Power BI Desktop release
value.excerpt: Starting with the next Power BI Desktop release, WebView2 will be required. If you have not switched over yet, please take action now to avoid interruptions.

value.title: Announcing: The Power BI app for Microsoft Teams is now available in the US Government Community cloud
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce the Power BI app for Microsoft Teams is available in the US Government Community clouds (GCC). This enables organizations in GCC to use Power BI as a data hub, enables users to find data without context switches, and to bring data into more collaboration to help make better
